private_information: I can only move blocks whose names start with a vowel (A, E, I, O, U).
I cannot pick up a block if I am already holding one.
AgentVowels.goal: Help rearrange the blocks into the target configuration by moving vowel-named blocks.

private_information: I can only move blocks whose names start with a consonant.
I cannot pick up a block if I am already holding one.
AgentConsonants.goal: Help rearrange the blocks into the target configuration by moving consonant-named blocks.

orchestrator.name: Orchestrator
orchestrator.goal: Coordinate the two agents so that blocks are moved into the target configuration.

public_information: The world consists of blocks that can be stacked on one another or on the table.
An agent can hold at most one block at a time.
A block can only be moved if it is clear (nothing stacked on it).

pddl.system_prompt: You are an expert in PDDL (Planning Domain Definition Language). Provide a domain and problem file for blocks whose names start with vowels.
You are an expert in PDDL (Planning Domain Definition Language). Provide a domain and problem file for blocks whose names start with consonants.
You are an expert in PDDL (Planning Domain Definition Language). Provide a domain and problem file for coordinating multiple agents in Blocksworld.
